TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract View

summary.span: 包含窗口或窗格的视图属性（全部显示、域底纹、表格虚框等）。

span.span: Contains the view attributes (show all, field shading, table gridlines, and so on) for a window or pane.

span.para: 使用View属性的或对象返回View对象。
使用属性更改视图。
使用属性屏幕上更改文本的大小。
使用属性查看注释、 尾注、 脚注或文档的页眉或页脚。
Use the View property of a or object to return the View object.
Use the property to change the view.
Use the property to change the size of the text on-screen.
Use the property to view comments, endnotes, footnotes, or the document header or footer.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Application As Application

summary.span: 返回对象代表 Microsoft Word 应用程序。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the Microsoft Word application.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int BrowseToWindow { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 仅供内部使用。

span.span: Reserved for internal use.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CollapseAllHeadings() runtime managed

summary.span: 折叠文档中的所有标题。

span.span: Collapses all the headings in the document.

span.para: 此方法对应于的上下文菜单中右键单击一个标题时出现的展开/折叠子菜单的折叠所有标题命令。
This method corresponds to the Collapse All Headings command on the Expand/Collapse submenu of the context menu that appears when you right-click a heading.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CollapseOutline([in]object& Range) runtime managed
Public Sub CollapseOutline (Optional ByRef Range As Object)

param.name: Range

span.span: Optional object.
The range of paragraphs to be collapsed.

param.span: 如果省略此参数，则折叠全部选定内容。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, the entire selection is collapsed.

summary.span: 将选定内容或指定范围内的正文折叠一个标题级别。

span.span: Collapses the text under the selection or the specified range by one heading level.

span.para: 注释 如果文档未处于大纲或主控文档视图，将发生错误。
Note If the document isn't in outline or master document view, an error occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdColumnWidth ColumnWidth { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdColumnWidth get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdColumnWidth value); };

summary.span: 返回或获取一个常量，该常量确定在阅读模式下的列宽。

span.span: Returns or gets a constant that determines the column width in reading mode.

summary.span: 读 / 写

span.span: Read-write

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ConflictMode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置是否为冲突模式视图中的文档。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the document is in conflict mode view.

value.span: true如果文档处于冲突模式视图;否则为false。

span.span: true if the document is in conflict mode view; otherwise, false.

span.para: 读/写。
Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，它指示在其中创建指定的对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the specified object was created.

remarks.span:
如果 Microsoft Word 中创建对象，此属性返回十六进制数字 4d535744，表示字符串"MSWD。"此值也可以由常量wdCreatorCode。主要设计
Creator属性用于 Macintosh，其中每个应用程序具有四个字符的创建者代码。例如，Microsoft Word 具有 MSWD 的创建者代码。有关此属性的其他信息，请咨询的语言参考 Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition 中包含的帮助。

span.para: If the object was created in Microsoft Word, this property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD." This value can also be represented by the constant wdCreatorCode.

The Creator property was primarily designed to be used on the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code. For example, Microsoft Word has the creator code MSWD. For additional information about this property, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisplayBackgrounds { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个 boolean 类型的值 ，该值表示是否在页面视图中显示文档时显示背景色和图像。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean that represents whether background colors and images are shown when a document is displayed in print layout view.

span.para: DisplayBackgrounds属性对应于背景色和图像 （仅页面视图） 选项对话框的视图选项卡上的选项。
The DisplayBackgrounds property corresponds to the Background colors and images (Print view only) option located on the View tab of the Options dialog box.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisplayPageBoundaries { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: True 显示顶部和底部页边距 (空白区域)，灰色区域 (灰色间隔) 文档中的页面之间。

span.span: True to display the top and bottom margins (white space) and the gray area (gray space) between pages in a document.

summary.span: False 隐藏这些白色和灰色区域，使页面形成很长的一页。

span.span: False to hide from view the white and gray space so that the pages flow together as one long page.

summary.span: 默认值为 True 。

span.span: The default value is True.

span.para: 此功能仅在打印布局视图中可用，并且只影响的顶部和底部页上，不左边和右边构成的页面的灰色间隔。此设置会影响中的文档指定窗口中。保存文档时，此设置的状态被保存。

This feature is only available in the Print Layout view and only affects the gray space on the top and bottom of a page, not the left and right sides of a page. This setting affects the document in the in the specified window. When the document is saved, the state of this setting is saved with it.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisplaySmartTags { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: True Microsoft Word 文档中显示智能标记下方下划线。

span.span: True for Microsoft Word to display an underline beneath smart tags in a document.

span.para: 智能标记与虚下划线的文档中标记。DisplaySmartTags属性设置为False不会删除智能标记;它仅将关闭下划线的显示。
Smart tags are marked in documents with a dashed underline. Setting the DisplaySmartTags property to False does not remove smart tags; it only turns off displaying the underline.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Draft { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果在窗口中的所有文本都会都显示在同一无衬线字体的格式设置很少以提高显示速度。

span.span: True if all the text in a window is displayed in the same sans-serif font with minimal formatting to speed up display.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int EnlargeFontsLessThan { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 仅供内部使用。

span.span: Reserved for internal use.

span.span: Expands all the headings in the document.

span.para: 此方法对应于的上下文菜单中右键单击一个标题时出现的展开/折叠子菜单上的展开所有标题命令。
This method corresponds to the Expand All Headings command on the Expand/Collapse submenu of the context menu that appears when you right-click a heading.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool FullScreen { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: True如果窗口处于全屏显示。

span.span: True if the window is in full-screen view.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Magnifier { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

span.b: 如果鼠标指针显示为放大镜在打印预览中，表示用户可以单击到放大页面的某个区域或缩小以查看整页或展开多页。

span.span: True if the pointer is displayed as a magnifying glass in print preview, indicating that the user can click to zoom in on a particular area of the page or zoom out to see an entire page or spread of pages.

span.para: 如果不是在打印预览视图中，则，此属性将产生错误。
This property generates an error if the view is not print preview.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool MailMergeDataView { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果而不是邮件合并字段指定窗口中显示邮件合并数据。

span.span: True if mail merge data is displayed instead of mail merge fields in the specified window.

span.para: 如果指定的窗口不是主文档，将发生错误。
If the specified window isn't a main document, an error occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsMode MarkupMode { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsMode get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsMode value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置常量，代表修订的显示模式。

span.span: Returns or sets a constant that represents the display mode for tracked changes.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void NextHeaderFooter() runtime managed

summary.span: 如果所选内容位于一个标题，此方法移至当前节的下一个页眉 （例如，从奇数页页眉到偶数页页眉） 或下一节中的第一个页眉。

span.span: If the selection is in a header, this method moves to the next header within the current section (for example, from an odd header to an even header) or to the first header in the following section.

summary.span: 如果所选内容位于页脚中，此方法将移至下一个页脚。

span.span: If the selection is in a footer, this method moves to the next footer.

span.para: 注释 如果所选内容位于最后一个页眉或页脚中的最后一节的文档，或者它根本不在页眉或页脚中，将发生错误。
Note If the selection is in the last header or footer in the last section of the document, or if it's not in a header or footer at all, an error occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdPageColor PageColor { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdPageColor get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdPageColor value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置在以阅读模式的页面颜色。

span.span: Returns and sets the page color in Reading mode.

summary.span: 读 / 写。

span.span: Read-write .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Panning { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个Boolean值，该值代表 Microsoft Office Word 是否处于平移模式。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean that represents whether Microsoft Office Word is in Panning mode.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 全景模式将鼠标指针变为手形，使用户按下并拖动文档以页面滚动。
Panning mode changes the mouse pointer to a hand and enables the user to press and drag the document to scroll through the pages.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parent As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Parent { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个对象，代表指定对象的父对象。

span.span: Returns an object that represents the parent object of the specified object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PreviousHeaderFooter() runtime managed

summary.span: 如果所选内容位于一个标题，此方法移至前一个页眉 （例如，从奇数页页眉偶数页页眉） 当前节或者的最后一个页眉在上一节。

span.span: If the selection is in a header, this method moves to the previous header within the current section (for example, from an even header to an odd header) or to the last header in the previous section.

summary.span: 如果所选内容位于页脚，此方法将移至前一个页脚。

span.span: If the selection is in a footer, this method moves to the previous footer.

span.para: 注释 如果所选内容位于第一个页眉或页脚中的文档，第一节，或者它根本不在页眉或页脚，将发生错误。
Note If the selection is in the first header or footer in the first section of the document, or if it's not in a header or footer at all, an error occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ReadingLayout { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 设置或返回一个Boolean值，该值代表是否在阅读版式视图中查看文档。

span.span: Sets or returns a Boolean that represents whether a document is being viewed in reading layout view.

span.para: 则返回 true ，则将文档切换到阅读版式视图中。False关闭阅读版式视图。
True switches the document to reading layout view. False closes reading layout view.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ReadingLayoutActualView { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 设置或返回一个 boolean 类型的值 ，该值代表是否在阅读版式视图中显示使用与打印页面相同的布局。

span.span: Sets or returns a Boolean that represents whether pages displayed in reading layout view are displayed using the same layout as printed pages.

span.para: 在阅读版式视图，页面不会显示包含文字打印页面中的全部内容，如普通视图或打印布局视图中，您将看到。而是它们将显示在屏幕。ReadingLayoutActualView属性设置为True时，就像显示打印时显示文档。监视器越小，这需要的缩放级别，这将使文档更容易阅读，但它没关系较大的显示器。

In reading layout view, pages are not displayed with the full content contained in the literal printed pages, as you would see in normal view or in print layout view. Instead they are displayed in screens. When the ReadingLayoutActualView property is set to True, the document is displayed as it would appear when printed. On smaller monitors, this requires a zoom level that makes the document hard to read, but it is fine for larger monitors.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ReadingLayoutAllowEditing { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 此对象、成员或枚举已被弃用并且不适合在您的代码中使用。

span.span: This object, member, or enumeration is deprecated and is not intended to be used in your code.

summary.span: 返回或设置常量值，该值代表是否边距可见还是隐藏当在阅读版式视图中查看文档。

span.span: Returns or sets a constant that represents whether margins are visible or hidden when a document is viewed in Full Screen Reading view.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RevisionsBalloonShowConnectingLines { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 真正 的 Microsoft Word 显示修订和注释气球的文本连接线条。

span.span: True for Microsoft Word to display connecting lines from the text to the revision and comment balloons.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsBalloonMargin RevisionsBalloonSide { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsBalloonMargin get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsBalloonMargin value); };

summary.span: 设置或返回一个常量，指定 Microsoft Word 是否在文档中的左边缘或右边距中显示修订气球。

span.span: Sets or returns a constant that specifies whether Microsoft Word displays revision balloons in the left or right margin in a document.

span.para: 可以是下列WdRevisionsBalloonMargin常量之一：
can be one of these WdRevisionsBalloonMargin constants:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float RevisionsBalloonWidth { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 设置或返回一个代表指定的修订气球宽度的 Microsoft Word 中的全局设置。

span.span: Sets or returns a Single representing the global setting in Microsoft Word that specifies the width of the revision balloons.

span.para: 修订气球宽度包括填充的文档距的气球和八分之一英寸气球缘纸张的边缘之间的边缘之间的 1.5 英寸。Microsoft Word 添加纸张的左边缘或右边缘的间距。此宽度扩展到边距并不会更改文档或纸张大小的宽度。使用属性指定用于设置RevisionsBalloonWidth属性的度量值。

The width of revision balloons includes padding of one-half inch between the document margin and the edge of the balloon and one-eighth of an inch between the edge of the balloon and the edge of the paper. Microsoft Word adds space along the left or right edge of the paper. This width is extended into the margin and does not change the width of the document or paper size. Use the property to specify the measurement to use when setting the RevisionsBalloonWidth property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsBalloonWidthType RevisionsBalloonWidthType { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsBalloonWidthType get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsBalloonWidthType value); };

summary.span: 设置或返回一个常量，该常量代表指定 Microsoft Word 度量修订气球宽度的方式的全局设置。

span.span: Sets or returns a constant representing the global setting that specifies how Microsoft Word measures the width of revision balloons.

span.para: 可以是下列WdRevisionsBalloonWidthType常量之一：
wdBalloonWidthPercent – 文档宽度的百分比度量。
wdBalloonWidthPoints – 以磅为单位。
RevisionsBalloonWidthType属性设置的度量单位设置时要使用属性。
can be one of these WdRevisionsBalloonWidthType constants:
wdBalloonWidthPercent – Measured as a percentage of the width of the document.
wdBalloonWidthPoints – Measured in points.
The RevisionsBalloonWidthType property sets the measurement unit to use when setting the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RevisionsFilter As RevisionsFilter

summary.span: 返回RevisionsFilter对象的实例。

span.span: Returns an instance of a RevisionsFilter object.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsMode RevisionsMode { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsMode get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsMode value); };

summary.span: 设置或返回一个常量，该常量代表指定 Microsoft Word 是否边距或嵌入的文档文本中显示气球的全局选项。

span.span: Sets or returns a constant representing the global option that specifies whether Microsoft Word displays balloons in the margin or inline with the document's text.

span.para: 可以是下列WdRevisionsMode常量之一：
wdBalloonRevisions – 在左边距或右边距的气球中显示修订。
wdInLineRevisions – 显示修订中删除使用删除线和下划线表示插入的文本。这是早期版本的 Word 的默认设置。
can be one of these WdRevisionsMode constants:
wdBalloonRevisions – Displays revisions in balloons in the left or right margin.
wdInLineRevisions – Displays revisions within the text using strikethrough for deletions and underlining for insertions. This is the default setting for prior versions of Word.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsView RevisionsView { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsView get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsView value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置在页面视图中显示的文档元素。

span.span: Returns or sets the document element displayed in print layout view.

span.para: 可以是下列WdSeekView常量之一：
如果视图不是页面视图，此属性将产生错误。
can be one of these WdSeekView constants:
This property generates an error if the view is not print layout view.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ShadeEditableRanges { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个整数，表示是否将底纹应用于文档中为其用户有权修改的区域。

span.span: Returns or sets an Integer that represents whether shading is applied to the ranges in a document for which users have permission to modify.

summary.span: True将底纹应用于文档的用户可以修改区域。

span.span: True shades the ranges in a document that users can modify.

span.para: 默认情况下，范围底纹处于打开状态。范围底纹时，或将该属性设置为True时， ShadeEditableRanges属性返回的值为 65535。ShadeEditableRanges属性设置为False时返回的值为 0。值没有任何意义超出指示属性是否为True或False。

Range shading is on by default. When range shading is on, or when you set the property to True, the ShadeEditableRanges property returns a value of 65535. When you set the ShadeEditableRanges property to False it returns a value of 0. The values have no meaning beyond indicating whether the property is True or False.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowAll { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果显示所有非打印字符 (如隐藏的文字、 制表符、 空格和段落标记)。

span.span: True if all nonprinting characters (such as hidden text, tab marks, space marks, and paragraph marks) are displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ShowAllHeadings() runtime managed

summary.span: 显示所有文本 （包括标题和正文） 和仅都显示标题之间切换。

span.span: Toggles between showing all text (headings and body text) and showing only headings.

span.para: 注释 如果不是大纲视图或者主控文档视图，则此方法将生成一个错误。
Note This method generates an error if the view isn't outline view or master document view.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowAnimation { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 此对象、成员或枚举已被弃用并且不适合在您的代码中使用。

span.span: This object, member, or enumeration is deprecated and is not intended to be used in your code.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowBookmarks { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果在每个书签的首尾显示方括号。

span.span: True if square brackets are displayed at the beginning and end of each bookmark.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowComments { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 真正 的 Microsoft Word 文档中显示的注释。

span.span: True for Microsoft Word to display the comments in a document.

span.para: 如果气球的右侧还是左侧的边距中显示修订标记，在气球中显示批注。内联显示的修订标记时，注释应用于文本外面范围方括号中;当用户将鼠标指针放在括号内的文本上方，正上方鼠标指针在方形气球中显示相关的备注。

If revision marks are displayed in balloons in the right or left margin, comments are displayed in balloons. If revision marks are displayed inline, the text to which comments apply is surrounded by wide-angled square brackets; when a user places the mouse pointer over the text within the brackets, the related comment is displayed in a square balloon directly above the mouse pointer.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowCropMarks { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个 boolean 类型的值 ，该值表示是否在页面，以指示页边距的位置的角显示裁剪标记。读/写。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean that represents whether to show crop marks in the corners of pages to indicate where margins are located. Read/write.

span.para: 显示裁切线不允许用户通过拖动裁切线更改的边距。裁切线仅显示以指示边距页中的位置。此属性对应于 Word 选项对话框的高级选项卡中的裁切线复选框。
注释： 裁切线东亚语言中默认情况下显示和所有其他语言中默认情况下处于关闭状态。

Displaying crop marks does not allow a user to change the margins by dragging the crop marks. Crop marks are only displayed to indicate where margins are located in the page. This property corresponds to the Crop marks check box in the Advanced tab of the Word Options dialog box.
Note: Crop marks are shown by default in East Asian languages and are off by default in all other langauges.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowDrawings { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: True如果在页面视图中显示绘图工具创建的对象。

span.span: True if objects created with the drawing tools are displayed in print layout view.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowFieldCodes { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如果为true则显示域代码。

span.span: True if field codes are displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowFirstLineOnly { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 真 要是正文文本的第一行显示在大纲视图中。

span.span: True if only the first line of body text is shown in outline view.

span.para: 如果视图不是大纲或主控文档视图，则此属性将产生错误。
This property generates an error if the view isn't outline or master document view.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowFormat { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果在大纲视图中可见的字符格式。

span.span: True if character formatting is visible in outline view.

span.para: 如果视图不是大纲或主控文档视图，则此属性将产生错误。
This property generates an error if the view isn't outline or master document view.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowFormatChanges { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果在大纲视图中可见的字符格式。

span.span: True if character formatting is visible in outline view.

span.para: 如果视图不是大纲或主控文档视图，则此属性将产生错误。
This property generates an error if the view isn't outline or master document view.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ShowHeading([in]int32 Level) runtime managed

param.name: Level

span.span: Required Integer.

param.span: 指大纲标题的级别（可取 1 到 9 之间数值）。

span.span: The outline heading level (a number from 1 to 9).

summary.span: 显示所有高于指定标题级别的标题，隐藏子标题和正文。

span.span: Shows all headings up to the specified heading level and hides subordinate headings and body text.

span.para: 注释 如果不是大纲视图或者主控文档视图，则此方法将生成一个错误。
Note This method generates an error if the view isn't outline view or master document view.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowHiddenText { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: True如果设置为隐藏文字格式的文本显示。

span.span: True if text formatted as hidden text is displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowHighlight { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: True如果突出显示格式显示和打印文档。

span.span: True if highlight formatting is displayed and printed with a document.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowHyphens { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果显示可选连字符。

span.span: True if optional hyphens are displayed.

summary.span: 可选连字符指明在何处断开单词位于一行的末尾时。

span.span: An optional hyphen indicates where to break a word when it falls at the end of a line.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowInkAnnotations { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个boolean 类型的值的显示或隐藏手写的墨迹注释。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean that shows or hides handwritten ink annotations.

summary.span: 如果显示墨迹注释， 则返回 true 。

span.span: True displays ink annotations.

summary.span: False 隐藏墨迹注释。

span.span: False hides ink annotations.

span.para: 若要处理墨迹注释，您必须运行 Microsoft Word 在平版电脑上。
To work with ink annotations, you must be running Microsoft Word on a tablet computer.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowInsertionsAndDeletions { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 真正 的 Microsoft Word 显示插入和删除的文档中启用修订所做。

span.span: True for Microsoft Word to display insertions and deletions that were made to a document with Track Changes enabled.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowMainTextLayer { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果显示页眉和页脚区域时同时显示指定文档中的文字。

span.span: True if the text in the specified document is visible when the header and footer areas are displayed.

span.para: ShowMainTextLayer属性等效于页眉和页脚工具栏上的显示/隐藏文档文本按钮。
The ShowMainTextLayer property is equivalent to the Show/Hide Document Text button on the Header and Footer toolbar.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowMarkupAreaHighlight { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个 boolean 类型的值 ，该值表示显示修订和注释气球的标记区域是否带底纹。读/写。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean that represents whether the markup area that shows revision and comment balloons is shaded. Read/write.

span.para: 此属性对应于审阅功能区上显示标记菜单中的标记区域突出显示选项。
This property corresponds to the Markup Area Highlight option in the Show Markup menu on the Review Ribbon.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowObjectAnchors { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果项目旁边显示锚点对象可在页面视图中定位。

span.span: True if object anchors are displayed next to items that can be positioned in print layout view.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowOptionalBreaks { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: True如果 Microsoft Word 显示可选换行符。

span.span: True if Microsoft Word displays optional line breaks.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowOtherAuthors { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置是否应在文档中可见其他作者的状态。

span.span: Gets or sets whether other authors' presence should be visible in the document.

value.span: true如果应显示在文档中; 其他作者的状态否则为false。

span.span: true if other authors' presence should be visible in the document; otherwise, false.

span.para: 读/写 boolean 类型的值。此属性用于切换显示共同创作时的其他作者的状态。
Read/write Boolean. Use this property to toggle showing other authors' presence while co-authoring.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowParagraphs { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果显示段落标记。

span.span: True if paragraph marks are displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowPicturePlaceHolders { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果空白方框作为图片的占位符进行显示。

span.span: True if blank boxes are displayed as placeholders for pictures.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowRevisionsAndComments { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 真正 的 Microsoft Word 显示修订和批注的文档中启用修订所做。

span.span: True for Microsoft Word to display revisions and comments that were made to a document with Track Changes enabled.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowSpaces { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果显示空格字符。

span.span: True if space characters are displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowTabs { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: True如果显示制表符。

span.span: True if tab characters are displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowTextBoundaries { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果显示页边距、 文本列、 对象和页面视图中的框架周围的虚线。

span.span: True if dotted lines are displayed around page margins, text columns, objects, and frames in print layout view.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ShowXMLMarkup { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 返回一个整数值，该值代表是否在文档中查看 XML 标记。

span.span: Returns An Integer that represents whether XML tags are viewed in a document.

span.para: True表示标记都可见。False ，则指示标记处于隐藏状态。wdToggle可以显示和隐藏 XML 标记之间切换。
True indicates that tags are visible. False indicates that tags are hidden. wdToggle allows you to switch between showing and hiding the XML markup.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdSpecialPane SplitSpecial { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdSpecialPane get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdSpecialPane value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置活动窗口的窗格。

span.span: Returns or sets the active window pane.

span.para: 可以是下列WdSpecialPane常量之一：
can be one of the following WdSpecialPane constants:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TableGridlines { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果显示表格虚框。

span.span: True if table gridlines are displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public Property Type As WdViewType
public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdViewType default { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdViewType get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdViewType value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置视图的类型。

span.span: Returns or sets the view type.

remarks.span:
可以是下列WdViewType常量之一：
wdMasterView
wdOutlineView
wdPrintView
wdNormalView
wdPrintPreview
wdWebView
wdReadingView
类型属性返回的所有文档的wdMasterView其中当前视图是大纲或主控文档。当前视图决不会返回wdOutlineView除非明确地设置代码中的第一次。要检查当前文档是否是大纲，请使用Type属性的
和集合的属性。Type属性返回wdOutlineView或wdMasterView和Count属性返回零，如果文档是大纲。

span.para: can be one of these WdViewType constants:

The Type property returns wdMasterView for all documents where the current view is an outline or a master document. The current view will never return wdOutlineView unless explicitly set first in code.

To check whether the current document is an outline, use the Type property and the collection's property. If the Type property returns either wdOutlineView or wdMasterView and the Count property returns zero, the document is an outline.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool WrapToWindow { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如果为true的文档窗口的右边缘，而不是在右边距或列的右边界换行。

span.span: True if lines wrap at the right edge of the document window rather than at the right margin or the right column boundary.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Zoom As Zoom
public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Zoom ^ Zoom { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Zoom ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回对象，表示指定视图的显示比例。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the magnification for the specified view.
